responses.question: Hello
responses.answer: Hello! How can I assist you today?

responses.question: My order has not arrived yet.
responses.answer: Please check your order status in the 'My Orders' section of your account. If the estimated delivery date has passed, kindly contact our support team with your order number.

responses.question: How can I reset my password?
responses.answer: You can reset your password by clicking on 'Forgot Password' on the login page and following the instructions.

responses.question: I am unable to log in to my account.
responses.answer: Ensure that you are using the correct email and password. If the issue persists, try resetting your password or clearing your browser cache.
